name: Rodeo Protocol
effect: Steal 1d8 Hit Points from target Titan and add the value to yourself. Reduce heat by 1d3.
description: Should a pilot rodeo another titan and successfully grab a battery, they may reduce heat by 1d3 and gain 1d8 hp upon embarking with the battery.
